name: Space Thing (ErroneousCreationist)
description:
made some random universe generator a while ago. 

Looks a bit pretty i guess? Have fun exploring with it

More may come soon, but due to my laziness, it may also not.

Who knows? 

CONTROLS: W - forward, A - left, S - back, D - right, Shift - up,  Control - down, 1 - slow speed mode, 2 - medium speed mode, 3 - SONIC SPEEEEEED
